name: Hamma Hat
description:
1. Hold the left mouse button to charge your attack
  2. Whilst charging, move the mouse to aim
  3. Release the left mouse button to attack

The Windows version looks much better than the HTML5 one.

For rating the game, please download the Windows version (for the full fat experience)!


In Hamma Hat, you play as the titular "Hamma" a construction robot tasked with destroying out of control robots on a construction site.

​   

"Rolla": This enemy isn't much on an enemy at all. Rolla just rolls about and getting in your way. Use Rollas to maximise your multiplier.

"Mixa": This enemy floats in place and spits concrete at you, stopping you in your tracks. If you are hit by concrete spit, then it's game over.

Don't worry, their robotic innards will be scrapped and recycled as toasters.
